entities.description: The categorization of the number of offenders reported in the context.
The raw count of cases per response category before any weighting adjustments.
The percentage that each category's unweighted frequency represents of the total.
Data that is missing or not reported in the survey.
Various statistical measures (mean, median, mode, etc.) describing the dataset.
Specifies the type of measurement for the variable (e.g., numeric).
The range of possible values for the variable, including the codes for missing data.

relationships.description: Specifies the frequency for each offender number category.
Indicates the percentage of cases each offender number category represents.
Indicates the amount of missing data in the survey.
Describes the data set with statistical measures such as mean, median, mode, etc.
Specifies the type of the variable used in the survey (e.g., numeric).
Specifies the range of values for each variable, including codes for missing data.
